Docs.summary: Represents a connection for an application to HealthVault for operations that are performed when a user is offline using the permissions granted by the user to the application.
Docs.remarks:
A connection must be made to HealthVault to access the Web methods that the service exposes. Implementers of this class does not maintain an open connection to the service. It uses XML over HTTP to to make requests and receive responses from the service. The connection just maintains the data necessary to make the request.
For operations that require the user to be online, use the class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the offline person who granted permissions to the calling application to perform certain operations.
Docs.value: A GUID representing the offline person.
